phrase.title: $t(wallet/add/common:phrase.title)
phrase.caption: Write down all the words of your wallet recovery phrase on a piece of paper in the exact order shown here
phrase.notice: Take no shortcuts, these words are crucial!
phrase.hidden: Make sure no one can see your screen

confirm.title: Confirm phrase
confirm.caption: Verify that you have written down the correct words

password.title: Set spending password
password.caption: Set a spending password to protect your wallet. Security increases with a longer password.

error.failed: Failed to create wallet, please retry.
error.spendingPassword: Error: createWallet: spending password not set.
error.paymentScript: Error: createWallet: payment script not set.
error.paymentPrvKey: Error: createWallet: payment key not set.
error.accountPubNotSet: Error: createWallet: account pub key list or address not set.
error.account: Unable to get wallet account, please reload or contact support if recurring.
